<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fresh Ingredients](/Feats.aspx?ID=1983) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 176 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Herbalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=62)

**Prerequisites**
[Herbalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1982); Expert in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

When using [Natural Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=815) to [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57), you can spend a batch of herbs to gain the +2 circumstance bonus from having fresh ingredients, even if not in wilderness. If you spend a batch of herbs in wilderness, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus instead.
name: Fresh Ingredients
